TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JpegBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class JpegBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定义用于编码联合图像专家组 (JPEG) 格式图像的编码器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 格式位图支持帧级缩略图和帧级元数据。format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata. 它们不支持预览、全局缩略图、全局元数据或多个帧。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 编码在部分信任环境中不起作用。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 有关部分信任的信息，请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security)。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](/dotnet/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在编码期间是否应水平翻转[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

value.span: 如果要在编码期间水平翻转图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 水平翻转表示源图像的无损转换，并替换以前的任何无损转换。The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性的值。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在编码期间是否应垂直翻转[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

value.span: 如果要在编码期间垂直翻转图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垂直翻转表示源图像的无损转换，并替换以前的任何无损转换。The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性的值。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所生成[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像的质量等级。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
The quality level of the JPEG image.

value.span: 值的范围为1（最低质量）到100（最高质量）（含）。

span.span: The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性的值。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示要将[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像旋转的角度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.
The degree to which the image is rotated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有90度的增量支持旋转。Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments. 旋转表示源图像的无损转换，并替换以前的任何无损转换。The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性的值。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
